title: Song of Songs
text: I am black but comely, O daughters of Jerusalem! Like the tents of Kedar, like the curtains of Solomon.
I adjure you, O daughters of Jerusalem, by the gazelles or by the hinds of the field, that you neither awaken nor arouse the love while it is desirous.
The watchmen who patrol the city found me; they smote me and wounded me; the watchmen of the walls took my jewelry off me.
